item.title: My Setup
item.description: Introduction This is a dump of different things and apps I use on a daily basis. Hope you will find it useful. Shell/Terminal Applications zsh — ZSH is a shell. It is very good alternative to bash which is used by default in most Linux distributions and in macOS. macOS uses very old version of bash because bash changed it’s license and Apple doesn’t like GPL. oh-my-zsh — framework for easy customization of ZSH.
